  (h₂ : ∀ x, x ≤ 0 ∧ Int.floor (-x) % 2 = 1 → f x = 1 + x)
  (h₃ : ∀ x, x ≤ 0 ∧ (Int.floor (-x) % 2 = 0 ∨ x = 0) → f x = 1 - x)
  (h₄ : ∀ x, f (f x) = -x) :
  ∀ x, 0 ≤ x ∧ Int.ceil x % 2 = 1 → f x = x - 1 ∧
  ∀ x, 0 ≤ x ∧ (Int.ceil x % 2 = 0 ∨ x = 0) → f x = -1 - x ∧
  ∀ x, x ≤ 0 ∧ Int.floor (-x) % 2 = 1 → f x = 1 + x ∧

formal_statement: theorem lean_workbook_26894 (a b c : ℝ) (ha : 0 < a) (hb : 0 < b) (hc : 0 < c) : (b + c) / a + ((c + a) * (a + b)) / (b * c) ≥ 8 * ((a / (b + c)) + (b * c) / ((c + a) * (a + b)))  := by sorry

name: lean_workbook_51090
formal_statement: theorem lean_workbook_51090 (x y z : ℝ) (hx : 0 < x) (hy : 0 < y) (hz : 0 < z) : (x + y) / z + (y + z) / x + (z + x) / y >= 6  := by sorry

name: lean_workbook_29461
formal_statement: theorem lean_workbook_29461 (a b c : ℝ) (ha : 0 < a) (hb : 0 < b) (hc : 0 < c) (habc : a + b + c = 1) : a * b + 2 * b * c + 3 * a * c ≤ 3 / 4  :=  by sorry

name: lean_workbook_47761
formal_statement: theorem lean_workbook_47761 (a b c : ℝ) (ha : 0 < a) (hb : 0 < b) (hc : 0 < c) (habc : a * b * c = 1) : (a + 1 / (a + 1)) * (b + 1 / (b + 1)) * (c + 1 / (c + 1)) ≥ 27 / 8  := by sorry

name: lean_workbook_plus_35078
formal_statement: theorem lean_workbook_plus_35078 (f : ℝ → ℝ) (hf: f (1)^2 + 1 ≤ 2 * f (1)) : f (1) = 1   :=  by sorry

name: lean_workbook_plus_60010
formal_statement:
theorem lean_workbook_plus_60010 (x y z : ℝ) :
  (x + y - z) * (z + x - y) * (x - y) * (x - z) + (y + z - x) * (x + y - z) * (y - z) * (y - x) + (z + x - y) * (y + z - x) * (z - x) * (z - y) ≥ 0   := by sorry

name: lean_workbook_plus_41962
formal_statement: theorem lean_workbook_plus_41962 (x y : ℝ) (hx : x > 0) (hy : y > 0) : 1/x + 1/y ≥ 4/(x + y)   :=  by sorry

name: lean_workbook_28207
formal_statement: theorem lean_workbook_28207 (u v : ℝ) : 0 ≤ (3 * u ^ 2 - 4 * v ^ 2) ^ 4 * (u ^ 2 - v ^ 2) ^ 2  :=  by sorry

name: lean_workbook_plus_7609
formal_statement: theorem lean_workbook_plus_7609 (a : ℝ) : Real.sin (3 * a) = -4 * (Real.sin a)^3 + 3 * (Real.sin a)   :=  by sorry

name: lean_workbook_plus_75815
formal_statement: theorem lean_workbook_plus_75815 (a b c A : ℝ) : (2 * a - b - c) * Real.sin (A / 2) + (2 * b - c - a) * Real.sin (B / 2) + (2 * c - a - b) * Real.sin (C / 2) = (a - b) * (Real.sin (A / 2) - Real.sin (B / 2)) + (b - c) * (Real.sin (B / 2) - Real.sin (C / 2)) + (c - a) * (Real.sin (C / 2) - Real.sin (A / 2))   :=  by sorry

name: lean_workbook_plus_37230
formal_statement: theorem lean_workbook_plus_37230 (u : ℝ) : (4 * u ^ 2) / (u ^ 4 + 2 * u ^ 2 + 1) = -4 / (1 + u ^ 2) ^ 2 + 4 / (1 + u ^ 2)   := by sorry

name: lean_workbook_45070
formal_statement: theorem lean_workbook_45070 (α β : ℝ) : sin (α + β) = sin α * cos β + sin β * cos α  :=  by sorry

name: lean_workbook_plus_10932
formal_statement: theorem lean_workbook_plus_10932 (a b c : ℤ) (ha : 0 < a) (hb : 0 < b) (hc : 0 < c) (habc : a + b + c = 1) : a * (1 + b - c)^(1 / 3) + b * (1 + c - a)^(1 / 3) + c * (1 + a - b)^(1 / 3) ≤ 1   :=  by sorry

name: lean_workbook_8216
formal_statement: theorem lean_workbook_8216 (x y z : ℝ) : x^4 + y^4 + z^4 - x^3*y - x^3*z - y^3*z - y^3*x - z^3*x - z^3*y + x*y*z^2 + x*y^2*z + x^2*y*z ≥ 0  := by sorry
